long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arch Attender (a.k.a. Archie) helps simplify school and university online attendance.
As you browse your class attendance pages, Archie reads attendance data and stores it in your browser, arranged by course. Archie enables you to
* View a course’s attendance as a grid, arranged by student and class date.
* Automatically browse class pages to refresh the attendance ‘snapshot’.
* Export course attendance to a Google Spreadsheet for backup or archiving.
* Compare the current attendance ‘snapshot’ against a baseline Google Spreadsheet.

Arch Attender presents an intuitive ‘One-Click’ interface which simplifies navigation of the attendance site. As a result, Arch Attender will make attendance management a breeze, potentially saving you days.

Please see the "Install, Test Drive and Configure" video for details of how to get started.

** Privacy Policy **
Arch Attender is an extension which reads attendance data from an attendance site for backup and comparison to user’s Google Spreadsheets.

Grace Giver
